trans-unit.source:
\n

Represents an isolated storage area containing files and directories.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Copies an existing file to a new file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx x xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the file to copy.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
This cannot be a directory or an existing file.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The isolated store has been removed.

-or-

Isolated storage is disabled.

-or-

destinationFileName exists.

-or-

An I/O error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxxxxxXxxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xx X$X xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Copies an existing file to a new file, and optionally overwrites an existing file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx x xxx xxxx$ xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the file to copy.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if the destination file can be overwritten; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The isolated store has been removed.

-or-

Isolated storage is disabled.

-or-

An I/O error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xx X$X xxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a directory in the isolated storage scope.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The relative path of the directory to create within the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The current code has insufficient permissions to create isolated storage directory.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a file in the isolated store.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The relative path of the file to create.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Deletes a directory in the isolated storage scope.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The relative path of the directory to delete within the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Deletes a file in the isolated storage scope.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The relative path of the file to delete within the isolated storage scope.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The target file is open or the path is incorrect.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether the specified path refers to an existing directory in the isolated store.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if path refers to an existing directory in the isolated store and is not null; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx $xx$xxxx$$xx$ xxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Determines whether the specified path refers to an existing file in the isolated store.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The path and file name to test.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: true if path refers to an existing file in the isolated store and is not null; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$$x$xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$ xx $xx$xxxx$$xx$ xxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxxxxxxxx$ $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the creation date and time of a specified file or directory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The path to the file or directory for which to obtain creation date and time information.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The creation date and time for the specified file or directory.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This value is expressed in local time.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The isolated store has been removed.

-or-

Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Enumerates the directories at the root of an isolated store.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of relative paths of directories at the root of the isolated store.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
A zero-length array specifies that there are no directories at the root.

\n
trans-unit.target: X xxxx$xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Caller does not have permission to enumerate directories.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One or more directories are not found.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Enumerates the directories in an isolated storage scope that match a given search pattern.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxx x xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of the relative paths of directories in the isolated storage scope that match searchPattern.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxx $xx$xxxxxxXxxxxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
A zero-length array specifies that there are no directories that match.

\n
trans-unit.target: X xxxx$xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Caller does not have permission to enumerate directories resolved from searchPattern.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxx $xx$xxxxxxXxxxxxx$$xx$.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The directory or directories specified by searchPattern are not found.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxxXxxxxxx$$xx$ xxx xxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Enumerates the file names at the root of an isolated store.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of relative paths of files at the root of the isolated store.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
A zero-length array specifies that there are no files at the root.

\n
trans-unit.target: X xxxx$xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

File paths from the isolated store root cannot be determined.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets the file names that match a search pattern.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An array of relative paths of files in the isolated storage scope that match searchPattern.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxxx $xx$xxxxxxXxxxxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
A zero-length array specifies that there are no files that match.

\n
trans-unit.target: X xxxx$xxxxxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxx xx xxxxx xxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The file path specified by searchPattern cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxxXxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxx xx xxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the date and time a specified file or directory was last accessed.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The path to the file or directory for which to obtain last access date and time information.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The date and time that the specified file or directory was last accessed.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
This value is expressed in local time.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The isolated store has been removed.

-or-

Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Returns the date and time a specified file or directory was last written to.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxx xxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The path to the file or directory for which to obtain last write date and time information.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The date and time that the specified file or directory was last written to.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx xx.

trans-unit.source:
This value is expressed in local time.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The isolated store has been removed.

-or-

Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Obtains user-scoped isolated storage corresponding to the calling code's application identity.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxxx$xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx$x xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

An object corresponding to the isolated storage scope based on the calling code's assembly identity.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxx$x xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Sufficient isolated storage permissions have not been granted.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Moves a specified directory and its contents to a new location.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xx x xxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the directory to move.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The path to the new location for sourceDirectoryName.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx $xx$xxxxxxXxxxxxxxxXxxx$$xx$.

trans-unit.source:
This cannot be the path to an existing directory.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The isolated store has been removed.

-or-

Isolated storage is disabled.

-or-

destinationDirectoryName already exists.

-or-

sourceDirectoryName and destinationDirectoryName refer to the same directory.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxxxxxxXxxxxxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$$x$xx$xxxxxxXxxxxxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xxx $xx$xxxxxxxxxxxXxxxxxxxxXxxx$$xx$ xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Moves a specified file to a new location, and optionally lets you specify a new file name.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx x xxx xxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxx x xxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The name of the file to move.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The path to the new location for the file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
If a file name is included, the moved file will have that name.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx x xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxxxx$ xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The isolated store has been removed.

-or-

Isolated storage is disabled.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x$x$$xx$$$x$$x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Opens a file in the specified mode.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The relative path of the file within the isolated store.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that specifies how to open the file.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

A file that is opened in the specified mode, with read/write access, and is unshared.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$ xxxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx$ xxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Opens a file in the specified mode with the specified read/write access.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The relative path of the file within the isolated store.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that specifies how to open the file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the file will be opened with read, write, or read/write access.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxx$ xxxxx$ xx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A file that is opened in the specified mode and access, and is unshared.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx$ xxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Opens a file in the specified mode, with the specified read/write access and sharing permission.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxx x xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$ xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The relative path of the file within the isolated store.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that specifies how to open or create the file.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the file will be opened with read, write, or read/write access

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxx$ xxxxx$ xx xxxx$xxxxx xxxxxx$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

A file that is opened in the specified mode and access, and with the specified sharing options.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$X xxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxx$ xxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x
